scripts.deploy:wasm: bash -c 'SRC="bazel-bin/ppp-wasm-wrap" ; DST="webapp/src/assets" ; rm -f $DST/ppp-wasm.{data,wasm,js} ; cp $SRC/ppp-wasm.{data,wasm,js} "$DST" && cp libppp/share/config.json $DST'
scripts.wasm:all: npm run build:wasm:release && npm run deploy:wasm
scripts.web:all: cd webapp && npm install && npm build:all && cd ..
scripts.firebase:deploy: bash -c 'pushd webapp ; npx firebase use --token $FIREBASE_DEPLOY_KEY myphotoidapp && npx firebase deploy --token $FIREBASE_DEPLOY_KEY --non-interactive ; popd'
